greeting_paragraphs: Nexus Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in April 2014 as an IT services company specializing in system development and consulting.

Our founding principle is 'Respect for People.' We strive to enhance our technical capabilities and service quality to earn the trust and satisfaction of our clients. Through our business, each employee continues to grow both professionally and personally, aiming to bring happiness to everyone involved.

Guided by this belief, we have assembled talent with rich development experience in upstream design, finance, public sector, and logistics, and we provide SE services across Japan. Additionally, for overseas clients primarily based in China, we offer IT services, SE support, consulting, and related products from a global perspective, utilizing diverse resources and know-how.
Though still a young company, all our employees are committed to continuous effort. We sincerely appreciate your continued support and trust.

history.event: Head office relocated to Sunrise Tachibana Building 7F, 3-10-14 Higashi-Nihonbashi, Chuo-ku, Tokyo.
Established subsidiary company Nexfo Co., Ltd.
Relocated head office to Tanaka Building, 5-15-1 Asakusabashi, Taito-ku, Tokyo.
Nexus Technology Co., Ltd. was officially established.
